Contact

Sebastian Meier

Data-driven Innovation


„Creating meaningful user-experiences by combining data-driven approaches with user-centric perspectives. As the founder of VISLAB.io, i am helping organizations transform their data vaults into engaging interactive experiences. Holding the position of lead data scientist at the Ideation & Protoyping Lab, I provide novel digital tools and services to Berlin's civil society and the local government. As the Head of Science at Berlin's CityLAB, i am strengthening the bonds between the research community within Berlin and beyond. I am the co-founder of the data-visualization tool SVIFT, co-founder of the Maptime Meetup Berlin and founder of the CityVis initiative. I teach HCI & data-driven design at the University of Applied Sciences Potsdam.“

Explore my recent work, experiments and research on VISLAB.io

Explore now »
